Improvements.Description: The InputStream object should be managed using try-with-resource to ensure it is closed automatically. This helps prevent resource leaks.

Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop for better readability
Improvements.Description: An enhanced for loop (for-each loop) should be used to iterate over the asyncAppenderArray for better readability and to prevent any potential off-by-one errors.
The null check on 'oneAppenderName' is redundant, as the null value would not be present in the 'asyncAppenderArray'.
